name: Atomik Unpredictable Meteors Field of Doom
name_original: Atomik Unpredictable Meteors Field of Doom
description:
!!!!!!! Works best if downloaded !!!!!!!

Atomik Unpredictable Meteors Field of Doom is a game made for the exhibition "Atomik Bazar" in Fribourg as part of the series "Atomik [...] of Doom".

Take control of the rocket and make it through as far as possible in this space mess.

On Windows : CTRL + ALT + "ARROW" (left or right & up to turn it back)

For 1 player, with classic keyboard inputs : W, A, S, D for movements SPACEBAR to confirm

Follow us on twitter: @SharpedStoneStd
Follow us on Facebook: @SharpedStoneStudios
